summary: 1993  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Tariq Ali  is a British Pakistani writer, journalist, and filmmaker. He is a member of the editorial committee of the New Left Review and Sin Permiso, and contributes to The Guardian, CounterPunch, and the London Review of Books.
He is the author of several books, including Pakistan: Military Rule or People's Power , Can Pakistan Survive? The Death of a State , Pirates Of The Caribbean: Axis Of Hope , Conversations with Edward Said , Bush in Babylon , and Clash of Fundamentalisms: Crusades, Jihads and Modernity , A Banker for All Seasons , The Duel , The Obama Syndrome  and The Extreme Centre: A Warning .
title: Tariq Ali
